dict.acceptation: 组成公司；包含；使混合；使具体化；

sent.orig: I will incorporate the new findings in my report.
sent.trans: 我要把新发现并入我的报告。

sent.orig: Do you incorporate a particular learning theory in your teaching? If so, describe the theory.
sent.trans: 您有教书的哲学吗？如果有，您的教书哲学是什么？请描述一下？

sent.orig: Is produced on specially machineries to incorporate all ingredients and to obtain a extraordinary structure.
sent.trans: 是用特殊方法使所有原材料都合作在一起，得到一种非常好的结构。

sent.orig: XP proponents practice continuous, incremental refactoring as a way to incorporate change.
sent.trans: XP方法的支持者在变化的环境中实践了连续的、增量式的重构方法。

sent.orig: Understand your ability to learn. Is it easy to memorize, comprehend and incorporate things you've learned?
sent.trans: 你会学习么？你学的东西你很容易记住，理解么？
